story.body:
Last year, I ushered in my mid-thirties with a personal crisis culminating in a first offense, misdemeanor DUI. How much is this going to impact my career?

I'm a software engineer with a reasonably good resume, advanced degree from a well known school and I'm highly productive.

I know every job I apply for in the future is going to have a checkbox about misdemeanors on the application. How much do I need to fear it?

Has anyone had experience with applying for software jobs with a record?
story.title: Software Engineer + DUI: What's going to happen to my career?
